name: Super Jewel Dx
description:
A match 3 game

Objectives

  • the player must move the pieces in the vetical or horizontal direction exchanging for adjacent pieces by clicking;
  • if the exchange results in 3 or more identical pieces in the same row or column, he will score poins, otherwise the excenged pieces will return to their places;
  • If the time runs out, then is game over;
